alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:53PM MDT until July 07 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR EASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY... At 453 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Evergreen, or 22 miles northeast of Pine Ridge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Porcupine, Kyle, Manderson, Wounded Knee, Lonesome Valley, Goose Neck Housing, Thunder Valley, Kyle North Route Housing, Sharps Corner, Evergreen, Porcupine Butte Housing and southwestern Pine Ridge Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
